# label

**Instance Property**

The string that identifies the kernel.

## Declaration

```swift
var label: String? { get set }
```

## Properties

- **options**: The set of options used to run the kernel.
- **MPSKernelOptions**: The options used when creating a kernel.
- **device**: The device on which the kernel will be used.
